title.rendered: STEDI ISUZU D-MAX (PRE AUG-2020) / M-UX (PRE JUL-2021) (LED MODELS) PIGGY BACK ADAPTOR

content.rendered:
Isuzu D-Max / M-ux Driving Light Piggy Back High Beam Adapter

DETAILS

Specifically designed to suit the Isuzu D-Max (Pre AUG-2020) / M-ux (Pre Jul-2021) with factory LED Headlight ONLY.

The easy solution for wiring up your Driving Lights with no need for splicing, trapping or soldering as it is a direct Plug & Play install.

Designed to work with all STEDI Quick Fit Wiring Harnesses.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

CONNECTOR TYPE 6 Pin
FITS ISUZU D-MAX / M-UX With Factory LED Headlights

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x Isuzu D-Max / M-ux High beam Adapter

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI ISUZU D-MAX / M-UX (LED MODELS) PIGGY BACK ADAPTER

Specifically designed to suit the Isuzu D-Max (Pre AUG-2020) / M-ux (Pre Jul-2021) with factory LED Headlight ONLY.

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
